title: India on course to being a top three services market for Citi: Shahmir Khaliq
description: India is poised to become one of Citi's top three markets within 5-7 years, driven by the expansion of its services business and increasing global investments by domestic firms. Currently the fourth largest market, India shows significant growth potential in manufacturing, exports, and digital payments.
